TopicTitle: This game brings out a side of me I thought had been lost a while ago...

Articles.Content: Greetings! My name is metdawg, I'm relatively new to this game (a friend showed it to me ~2 weeks ago, thank goodness it was after finals for the summer term...) and have developed a slight obsession. I study aerospace engineering IRL, and if I had this game back when I took an intro orbital mechanics course, well, my knowledge of that material would have been much greater. Thanks to the dev team for making this game as awesome as it is, while keeping it open to let the users have fun with plugins and the community. I've got some other projects I'm working on right now, but you'll see my name in the contests in the near future, so watch out.
Welcome to the forums! I'm glad you enjoy the game.
